attributes.action: create a law requiring all banks to be publicly audited regularly to ensure they are protecting the British economy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for the government to create a law requiring all high street and other banks to be audited as often as necessary. This would be required to be conducted by the BoE, the FSA or another public body. The purpose of these audits would be to ensure banks are lending responsibly and doing all they can to protect the economy. This would help identify potential threats
